titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to J. H. Graham
CWG13788

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; Folder 1864 Clothing, Camp & Garrison Equipage, Telegraph Expenses, Some Claim Letters; Bundle 2

body.p:
No. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To J. H. Graham Dr.
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

S. G. Suddarth
Quarter-Master Genl. of Ky.
Received at Frankfort, Ky, the 22 of March 1864, of S. G. Suddarth, Quarter-master ^Genl^ Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Thirty Dollars and -- Cents, in full of the above account.

34.
No. 22.
No. 23 Abstract B T Qr. 186
J H Graham
Dollars 30 x/100
Paid 22" March, 1864.
Telegraphing
J237
certif no 34
